Title: The Painful Eagerness of Unfed Hope
Writer: Moira Walley-Beckett (created by), Lucy Maud Montgomery (based on "Anne of Green Gables"), Jane Maggs, Alina Mankin (executive story editor), Kathryn Borel (executive story editor)
Actors: Amybeth McNulty, Geraldine James, R.H. Thomson, Lucas Jade Zumann
Plot: Anne writes letters as an "agent of romance" while Diana trains at home to be a lady. A life-changing encounter steers Gilbert toward his destiny.
